name: diet-bulma
description: Some simplified bulma styles to help people coming from other css frameworks (especially bootstrap). Sass is required to compile this into a css file. This assumes you will be using node-sass and including the bulma file from node_modules. I MIGHT update and or create tutorials at my discretion, but no promises as this is mostly for my own uses (for now). Use at your own risk. Please suggest improvements.
author: Ryan Carter
